title: Effigy Mounds National Monument: Bookstore
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Bookstore            Bookstore        The bookstore sells souvenirs as well as books on mound building cultures, natural history, and more. NPS Photo   Â     Make sure to leave time after hiking the Monument's trails to visit our bookstore - located in the visitor center. The bookstore is operated by Eastern National, a not-for-profit cooperating organization. All purchases benefit Effigy Mounds National Monument.  Not traveling to Effigy Mounds National Monument, or not enough time during your stay? Visit our eParks.
